title: Why doesn't champion score affect LP
body:
The premise itself of individual points difference for results from a team game is ridiculous. So since Riot have implemented a way to gauge individual performances in a game, why not have the champion score have an effect on the LP loss/gain from a game. Is it fair that you may play extremely well in a game, well enough to be given an S+ rating, but still have full LP loss for someone else causing a loss.

Say do something like this:
If LP gain was going to be say 20 from a game, give maybe +/- 33% LP based on mastery, so;

S gives say 26
A gives 23
B gives 20
C gives 17
Lower gives 14

And same with losses, say loss would've caused 20LP loss:
S changes loss to 14
A changes loss to 17
B changes loss to 20
C changes loss to 23
Lower changes loss to 26.

I just find the idea that your point gain/loss for INDIVIDUAL rank isn't determined at all by your INDIVIDUAL performance.


On another note, premade should not have any effect on champion score; that's just really dumb from Riot.

replies.body:
[Because basing LP gains off of numbers such as KDA and CS will turn the game into an anti-social farm fest/ in-team fights of KS. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide#q2)

I have won many games where our 0/10 member distracting the enemy team with a strong split push allows my team to get the baron and rotate for the win. It isn't about your score in the end, Its about how you play the game. 

Heaps of examples out there, I'm sure you can think of some yourself. 

* Supports sacrificing themselves for the team
* A split pusher that dies a lot but allows the rest of the team to push objectives safely
* Someone not worried about their score is more inclined to make the risky plays that make/break a game. 

>On another note, premade should not have any effect on champion score; that's just really dumb from Riot.

[Premade doesn't have an effect on master grades, only the number of master points earned if the champ you are plays had less than lvl 5 mastery.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q3)
